game.name: Happy Horse Hair Studio
game.description:
You will definitely fall in love with the main character after exploring this brand new animal game for kids in your device. Here you will meet with a cute horse who wants a complete makeover for an outing. The horse is not aware of the latest fashion trends because of staying at home, usually. This cute female animal is very lucky since she has chosen as his stylist. Are you interested in attempting this new sort of challenge? Join Happy Horse Hair Studio and help the animal to wear the best style she has ever used!

Check out plenty of make-up and accessory options and choose the one that suits your horse the best in this makeover games for girls! Browse various hair and shoe options with the help of arrow keys! Begin the game with giving her a nice hairstyle with a lovely color. Make sure to choose a suitable skin tone for the horse. Also check out various eyeshadow and eyes color options and help her finalize the one that improves her natural beauty perfectly.

Give her eyes a lovely mascara in this cool makeup game for kids! There is a huge assortment of accessories, including flowers shaped, diamond shaped, heart-shaped or star-shaped hairband. Make sure to complete her look with a pair of cute matching shoes. Once you are done, do not forget to click the Show button to see the final result. Click the reset button if you want to play this one of the best decoration games for girls again in your device. We have plenty of other free HTML5 games to play on our top gaming website.
